channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiRecorder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiRecorder

item.title: CVE-2022-22297|2024-10-22T20:48:26.477Z -- fortinet -- fortirecorder
item.description: An incomplete filtering of one or more instances of special elements vulnerability [CWE-792] in the command line interpreter of FortiWeb version 6.4.0 through 6.4.1, FortiWeb version 6.3.0 through 6.3.17, FortiWeb all versions 6.2, FortiWeb all versions 6.1, FortiWeb all versions 6.0, FortiRecorder version 6.4.0 through 6.4.3, FortiRecorder all versions 6.0, FortiRecorder all versions 2.7 may allow an authenticated user to read arbitrary files via specially crafted command arguments.
